attributes.action: Abolish Booking Fees on Concert and Theatre Tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently I purchased some tickets to a Sporting Event, only to find that EACH TICKET carried a Booking Fee of £7.50. Also 2nd Class Postage was £2.25, even though the Price of 2nd Class Postage up to 100g is 23p!

If a Ticket is advertised at £50, then that is the price you should pay.

This is Simple greed by Ticket Agencies, who already make a massive profit through the value of the Ticket alone.
